original_title: Daring to Dream: England's Story at the 2018 FIFA World Cup
overview: In the summer of 2018 the England football team defied expectations to reach the semi-finals of the FIFA World Cup™, achieving their best result in the tournament in 28 years and becoming the nation’s heroes. Following the highs and lows of the England squad’s journey, including highlights from all England matches and every goal; this is the perfect way to relieve the moment in time when a country dared to dream that football was coming home.
title: Daring to Dream: England's Story at the 2018 FIFA World Cup
